core.logline: An ambitious sitar prodigy from Varanasi must choose between family tradition and a global stage.
core.synopsis:
Born to a lineage of classical musicians, Meera dreams of fusing Hindustani ragas with modern electronica. When a Mumbai producer offers her a life-changing collaboration, she confronts community expectations and a protective father.
